_pRange.descriptionZh: 包含此交货中物品的整体订单
_pRange.rdfs:comment: The overall order the items in this delivery were included in.
_pRange.rdfs:label: partOfOrder

_pRange.descriptionZh: 与此收据对应的客户订单。 一个收据可以对应一个或多个订单。
_pRange.rdfs:comment: The Order(s) related to this Invoice. One or more Orders may be combined into a single Invoice.
_pRange.rdfs:label: referencesOrder

_properties.descriptionZh: 报价，例如订单中包含的产品、数量、价格的组合
_properties.rdfs:comment: The offer(s) -- e.g., product, quantity and price combinations -- included in the order.
_properties.rdfs:label: acceptedOffer

_properties.rdfs:comment: The billing address for the order.
_properties.rdfs:label: billingAddress

_properties.descriptionZh: 安排买方和卖方进行交易的实体。 大多数情况下，经纪人从未获取或发布交易所涉及的产品或服务的所有权。
_properties.rdfs:comment: An entity that arranges for an exchange between a buyer and a seller.  In most cases a broker never acquires or releases ownership of a product or service involved in an exchange.  If it is not clear whether an entity is a broker, seller, or buyer, the latter two terms are preferred.
_properties.rdfs:label: broker

_properties.descriptionZh: 已经收到的订单或者付款的确认编号。
_properties.rdfs:comment: A number that confirms the given order or payment has been received.
_properties.rdfs:label: confirmationNumber

_properties.descriptionZh: 下单或支付单据的一方。
_properties.rdfs:comment: Party placing the order or paying the invoice.
_properties.rdfs:label: customer

_properties.descriptionZh: 任何适用（于订单）的折扣。
_properties.rdfs:comment: Any discount applied (to an Order).
_properties.rdfs:label: discount

_properties.rdfs:comment: Code used to redeem a discount.
_properties.rdfs:label: discountCode

_properties.descriptionZh: 折扣所使用的货币类型。
_properties.rdfs:comment:
The currency of the discount.

Use standard formats: ISO 4217 currency format e.g. "USD"; Ticker symbol for cryptocurrencies e.g. "BTC"; well known names for Local Exchange Tradings Systems (LETS) and other currency types e.g. "Ithaca HOUR".
_properties.rdfs:label: discountCurrency

_properties.rdfs:comment: Was the offer accepted as a gift for someone other than the buyer.
_properties.rdfs:label: isGift

_properties.rdfs:comment: Date order was placed.
_properties.rdfs:label: orderDate

_properties.rdfs:comment: The delivery of the parcel related to this order or order item.
_properties.rdfs:label: orderDelivery

_properties.rdfs:comment: The identifier of the transaction.
_properties.rdfs:label: orderNumber

_properties.rdfs:comment: The current status of the order.
_properties.rdfs:label: orderStatus

_properties.rdfs:comment: The item ordered.
_properties.rdfs:label: orderedItem

_properties.descriptionZh: 所属账单，作为所属Invoice实体的一部分被付款的订单
_properties.rdfs:comment: The order is being paid as part of the referenced Invoice.
_properties.rdfs:label: partOfInvoice

_properties.rdfs:comment: The date that payment is due.
_properties.rdfs:label: paymentDueDate

_properties.descriptionZh: 信用卡的名称或订单的其他付款方式
_properties.rdfs:comment: The name of the credit card or other method of payment for the order.
_properties.rdfs:label: paymentMethod

_properties.descriptionZh: 使用付款方式的标识符，例如信用卡的最后4位数字
_properties.rdfs:comment: An identifier for the method of payment used (e.g. the last 4 digits of the credit card).
_properties.rdfs:label: paymentMethodId

_properties.rdfs:comment: The URL for sending a payment.
_properties.rdfs:label: paymentUrl

_properties.descriptionZh: 提供商品出售、物品租赁、贷款等服务的人或组织。
_properties.rdfs:comment: An entity which offers (sells / leases / lends / loans) the services / goods.  A seller may also be a provider.
_properties.rdfs:label: seller

_pTree.descriptionZh: 订单是一种交易的确认，它可以包含多个商品及其报价。
_pTree.rdfs:comment: An order is a confirmation of a transaction (a receipt), which can contain multiple line items, each represented by an Offer that has been accepted by the customer.
_pTree.rdfs:label: Order

_properties.descriptionZh: 该项的一个附加类型， 通常用于从外部词典中向微数据语法添加更加具体的类型。它表示事物和事物本身所属的类之间的关系。在RDFa语法中, 对多类型最好使用‘typeof’属性这样的本地RDFa语法. Schema.org 工具对额外类型的理解较弱，特别是外部定义的额外类型。
_properties.rdfs:comment: An additional type for the item, typically used for adding more specific types from external vocabularies in microdata syntax. This is a relationship between something and a class that the thing is in. In RDFa syntax, it is better to use the native RDFa syntax - the 'typeof' attribute - for multiple types. Schema.org tools may have only weaker understanding of extra types, in particular those defined externally.
_properties.rdfs:label: additionalType

_properties.rdfs:comment: An alias for the item.
_properties.rdfs:label: alternateName

_properties.rdfs:comment: A description of the item.
_properties.rdfs:label: description

_examples.MICRODATA:
George Bush, the
  41st President of the United States
  is the father of
  
    George W. Bush, the
    43rd President of the United States.
_examples.PRE-MARKUP: George Bush, the 41st President of the United States is the father of George W. Bush, the 43rd President of the United States.
_examples.RDFA:
George Bush, the
  41st President of the United States
  is the father of
  
    George W. Bush, the
    43rd President of the United States.

_properties.descriptionZh: 描述的子属性。 用于消除与其他类似项之间歧义的简短描述。 其它属性（特别是名称）的信息对于消歧义可能是必要的。
_properties.rdfs:comment: A sub property of description. A short description of the item used to disambiguate from other, similar items. Information from other properties (in particular, name) may be necessary for the description to be useful for disambiguation.
_properties.rdfs:label: disambiguatingDescription

_properties.rdfs:comment: The identifier property represents any kind of identifier for any kind of Thing, such as ISBNs, GTIN codes, UUIDs etc. Schema.org provides dedicated properties for representing many of these, either as textual strings or as URL (URI) links. See background notes for more details.
_properties.rdfs:label: identifier

_examples.MICRODATA:
Mom's World Famous Banana Bread
  By John Smith,
  May 8, 2009
  
  This classic banana bread recipe comes
  from my mom -- the walnuts add a nice texture and flavor to the banana
  bread.
  Prep Time: 15 minutes
  Cook time: 1 hour
  Yield: 1 loaf
  Tags: Low fat
  
    Nutrition facts:
    240 calories,
    9 grams fat
  
  Ingredients:
  - 3 or 4 ripe bananas, smashed
  - 1 egg
  - 3/4 cup of sugar
  ...
  Instructions:
  
  Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Mix in the ingredients in a bowl. Add
  the flour last. Pour the mixture into a loaf pan and bake for one hour.
  
  140 comments:
  
    
    
  
  From Janel, May 5 -- thank you, great recipe!
  ...
_examples.PRE-MARKUP:
Mom's World Famous Banana Bread
By John Smith, May 8, 2009

This classic banana bread recipe comes from my mom -- the walnuts add a nice
 texture and flavor to the banana bread.
Prep Time: 15 minutes
Cook time: 1 hour
Yield: 1 loaf
Tags: Low fat
Nutrition facts:
240 calories, 9 grams fat
Ingredients:
- 3 or 4 ripe bananas, smashed
- 1 egg
- 3/4 cup of sugar
...
Instructions:
 Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Mix in the ingredients in a bowl. Add the
 flour last. Pour the mixture into a loaf pan and bake for one hour.
140 comments:
From Janel, May 5 -- thank you, great recipe!
...

_examples.MICRODATA:
ACME Hotel Innsbruck
  
  A beautifully located business hotel right in the
heart of the alps. Watch the sun rise over the scenic Inn valley while
enjoying your morning coffee.

  A beautifully located business hotel right in the
heart of the alps. Watch the sun rise over the scenic Inn valley while
enjoying your morning coffee.

_properties.rdfs:comment: An image of the item. This can be a URL or a fully described ImageObject.
_properties.rdfs:label: image

_properties.descriptionZh: 表示这个东西是描述的主要实体的页面
_properties.rdfs:comment: Indicates a page (or other CreativeWork) for which this thing is the main entity being described. See background notes for details.
_properties.rdfs:label: mainEntityOfPage

_properties.rdfs:comment: The name of the item.
_properties.rdfs:label: name

_properties.descriptionZh: 潜在的与之搭配的动作，它描述了一个理想化的动作，在这个动作中，这个东西会起到“对象”的作用。
_properties.rdfs:comment: Indicates a potential Action, which describes an idealized action in which this thing would play an 'object' role.
_properties.rdfs:label: potentialAction

_properties.rdfs:comment: URL of a reference Web page that unambiguously indicates the item's identity. E.g. the URL of the item's Wikipedia page, Wikidata entry, or official website.
_properties.rdfs:label: sameAs

_properties.rdfs:comment: URL of the item.
_properties.rdfs:label: url

_pTree.rdfs:comment: The most generic type of item.
_pTree.rdfs:label: Thing

descriptionZh: 订单是一种交易的确认，它可以包含多个商品及其报价。

isDomainOf.descriptionZh: 报价，例如订单中包含的产品、数量、价格的组合
isDomainOf.rdfs:comment: The offer(s) -- e.g., product, quantity and price combinations -- included in the order.
isDomainOf.rdfs:label: acceptedOffer

isDomainOf.descriptionZh: 账单的邮寄地址。
isDomainOf.rdfs:comment: The billing address for the order.
isDomainOf.rdfs:label: billingAddress

isDomainOf.descriptionZh: 安排买方和卖方进行交易的实体。 大多数情况下，经纪人从未获取或发布交易所涉及的产品或服务的所有权。
isDomainOf.rdfs:comment: An entity that arranges for an exchange between a buyer and a seller.  In most cases a broker never acquires or releases ownership of a product or service involved in an exchange.  If it is not clear whether an entity is a broker, seller, or buyer, the latter two terms are preferred.
isDomainOf.rdfs:label: broker

isDomainOf.descriptionZh: 已经收到的订单或者付款的确认编号。
isDomainOf.rdfs:comment: A number that confirms the given order or payment has been received.
isDomainOf.rdfs:label: confirmationNumber

isDomainOf.descriptionZh: 下单或支付单据的一方。
isDomainOf.rdfs:comment: Party placing the order or paying the invoice.
isDomainOf.rdfs:label: customer

isDomainOf.descriptionZh: 任何适用（于订单）的折扣。
isDomainOf.rdfs:comment: Any discount applied (to an Order).
isDomainOf.rdfs:label: discount

isDomainOf.descriptionZh: 用来兑换折扣的代码。
isDomainOf.rdfs:comment: Code used to redeem a discount.
isDomainOf.rdfs:label: discountCode

isDomainOf.descriptionZh: 折扣所使用的货币类型。
isDomainOf.rdfs:comment:
The currency of the discount.

Use standard formats: ISO 4217 currency format e.g. "USD"; Ticker symbol for cryptocurrencies e.g. "BTC"; well known names for Local Exchange Tradings Systems (LETS) and other currency types e.g. "Ithaca HOUR".
isDomainOf.rdfs:label: discountCurrency

isDomainOf.descriptionZh: 是否礼物
isDomainOf.rdfs:comment: Was the offer accepted as a gift for someone other than the buyer.
isDomainOf.rdfs:label: isGift

isDomainOf.descriptionZh: 属性'seller'的旧称（这样的陈旧条目是否应该删掉）
isDomainOf.rdfs:comment: 'merchant' is an out-dated term for 'seller'.
isDomainOf.rdfs:label: merchant

isDomainOf.descriptionZh: 下单的日期
isDomainOf.rdfs:comment: Date order was placed.
isDomainOf.rdfs:label: orderDate

isDomainOf.descriptionZh: 订单所选物流
isDomainOf.rdfs:comment: The delivery of the parcel related to this order or order item.
isDomainOf.rdfs:label: orderDelivery

isDomainOf.descriptionZh: 订单编号
isDomainOf.rdfs:comment: The identifier of the transaction.
isDomainOf.rdfs:label: orderNumber

isDomainOf.descriptionZh: 订单的当前状态
isDomainOf.rdfs:comment: The current status of the order.
isDomainOf.rdfs:label: orderStatus

isDomainOf.descriptionZh: 订单条目
isDomainOf.rdfs:comment: The item ordered.
isDomainOf.rdfs:label: orderedItem

isDomainOf.descriptionZh: 所属账单，作为所属Invoice实体的一部分被付款的订单
isDomainOf.rdfs:comment: The order is being paid as part of the referenced Invoice.
isDomainOf.rdfs:label: partOfInvoice

isDomainOf.descriptionZh: 最晚付款日期
isDomainOf.rdfs:comment: The date that payment is due.
isDomainOf.rdfs:label: paymentDue

isDomainOf.descriptionZh: 最晚付款日期
isDomainOf.rdfs:comment: The date that payment is due.
isDomainOf.rdfs:label: paymentDueDate

isDomainOf.descriptionZh: 信用卡的名称或订单的其他付款方式
isDomainOf.rdfs:comment: The name of the credit card or other method of payment for the order.
isDomainOf.rdfs:label: paymentMethod

isDomainOf.descriptionZh: 使用付款方式的标识符，例如信用卡的最后4位数字
isDomainOf.rdfs:comment: An identifier for the method of payment used (e.g. the last 4 digits of the credit card).
isDomainOf.rdfs:label: paymentMethodId

isDomainOf.descriptionZh: 发送付款的URL
isDomainOf.rdfs:comment: The URL for sending a payment.
isDomainOf.rdfs:label: paymentUrl

isDomainOf.descriptionZh: 提供商品出售、物品租赁、贷款等服务的人或组织。
isDomainOf.rdfs:comment: An entity which offers (sells / leases / lends / loans) the services / goods.  A seller may also be a provider.
isDomainOf.rdfs:label: seller

isRangeOf.descriptionZh: 包含此交货中物品的整体订单
isRangeOf.rdfs:comment: The overall order the items in this delivery were included in.
isRangeOf.rdfs:label: partOfOrder

isRangeOf.descriptionZh: 与此收据对应的客户订单。 一个收据可以对应一个或多个订单。
isRangeOf.rdfs:comment: The Order(s) related to this Invoice. One or more Orders may be combined into a single Invoice.
isRangeOf.rdfs:label: referencesOrder

rdfs:comment: An order is a confirmation of a transaction (a receipt), which can contain multiple line items, each represented by an Offer that has been accepted by the customer.
rdfs:label: Order
